body.title: Request
body.elms:
```js
// GET  /user/tj
req.path         //=> "/user/tj"
req.url          //=> "/user/tj"
req.xhr          //=> true|false
req.method       //=> "GET"
req.params
req.params.name  //=> "tj"
req.params[0]
```

```js
// GET /search?q=tobi+ferret
req.query.q // => "tobi ferret"
```
